body.p:
State of Kentucky
County of Jefferson

John Schroeder states on oath that he is a resident of Louisville Ky. that he is personally acquainted with Wm Salzman who was was indicted in the Jefferson Circuit Court, and for whom David Schroeder this affiants father went bail and that about ^the^ 12th of last May his said father sent him to Nashville Tennessee. to look after said Salzman, he ^said Salzman^ having left Louisville some time previous, and that after making search for several days succeeded in finding him in Nashville Tenn where he was in the service of the United States being a member of the 12 Regiment of Michigan volunteers. And that he conversed with said Salzman and requested him to come back to Louisville -- and deliver himself up to the proper authorities which said Salzman refused to do.
Subscribed and sworn to before me by John Schroeder this 21st day of November 1864

John N Mattingly
Notary Public Jeff Co Ky
